retriever.app package¶

Submodules¶

retriever.app.app module¶

Contains implementations of wx.App and wx.Frame for the GUI.

Draw(evt)[source]¶

When the page is drawn, it may need to update its fields if the selected database has changed.

retriever.app.controls module¶

Custom implementations of wxPython controls for use in the Retriever.

retriever.app.download_manager module¶

This class manages dataset downloads concurrently and processes progress output.

retriever.app.images module¶

Embedded icons.

retriever.app.logo module¶

retriever.app.main module¶

EcoData Retriever UI

This module contains the UI elements of the EcoData Retriever platform.

The application can be started by running the launch_app function with a list of Category objects.

retriever.app.main.launch_app(lists)[source]¶

Launches the application GUI.

retriever.app.splash module¶

Module contents¶

wxPython GUI for EcoData Retriever.
